verses.verse: כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> behold בַּיָּמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> For behold in those days הָהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> those וּבָעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> and in that time הַהִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> When [אָשׁוּב כ] (אָשִׁ֛יב <S%H7725><s%> break ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁב֥וּת <S%H7622><s%> the captivity יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem

וְקִבַּצְתִּי֙ <S%H6908><s%> I will also gather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> all nations וְה֣וֹרַדְתִּ֔ים <S%H3381><s%> and will bring them down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> into the valley יְהֽוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <S%H3092><s%> of Jehoshaphat וְנִשְׁפַּטְתִּ֨י <S%H8199><s%> and will plead עִמָּ֜ם <S%H5973><s%> them שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> behalf עַמִּ֨י <S%H5971><s%> with them there for my people וְנַחֲלָתִ֤י <S%H5159><s%> and [for] my heritage יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Whom פִּזְּר֣וּ <S%H6340><s%> whom they have scattered בַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> among the nations וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצִ֖י <S%H776><s%> my land חִלֵּֽקוּ׃ <S%H2505><s%> and parted

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> for my people יַדּ֣וּ <S%H3032><s%> And they have cast גוֹרָ֑ל <S%H1486><s%> lots וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> and have given הַיֶּ֙לֶד֙ <S%H3206><s%> a boy בַּזּוֹנָ֔ה <S%H2181><s%> for an harlot וְהַיַּלְדָּ֛ה <S%H3207><s%> a girl מָכְר֥וּ <S%H4376><s%> and sold בַיַּ֖יִן <S%H3196><s%> for wine וַיִּשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <S%H8354><s%> that they might drink

וְ֠גַם <S%H1571><s%> Moreover מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> what אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you לִי֙ צֹ֣ר <S%H6865><s%> Yea and what have ye to do with me O Tyre וְצִיד֔וֹן <S%H6721><s%> and Zidon וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all גְּלִיל֣וֹת <S%H1552><s%> and all the coasts פְּלָ֑שֶׁת <S%H6429><s%> Palestina הַגְּמ֗וּל <S%H1576><s%> your recompence אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you מְשַׁלְּמִ֣ים <S%H7999><s%> make amends עָלָ֔י <S%H5921><s%> and וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> do גֹּמְלִ֤ים <S%H1580><s%> recompense אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you עָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> and קַ֣ל <S%H7031><s%> me swiftly מְהֵרָ֔ה <S%H4120><s%> [and] speedily אָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> will I return גְּמֻלְכֶ֖ם <S%H1576><s%> your recompense בְּרֹאשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H7218><s%> upon your own head

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Since כַּסְפִּ֥י <S%H3701><s%> my silver וּזְהָבִ֖י <S%H2091><s%> and my gold לְקַחְתֶּ֑ם <S%H3947><s%> Because ye have taken וּמַֽחֲמַדַּי֙ <S%H4261><s%> pleasant things הַטֹּבִ֔ים <S%H2896><s%> my goodly הֲבֵאתֶ֖ם <S%H935><s%> and have carried לְהֵיכְלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1964><s%> into your temples

וּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> The children יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> also of Judah וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the children יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem מְכַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H4376><s%> have ye sold לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons הַיְּוָנִ֑ים <S%H3125><s%> to the Greeks לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> order הַרְחִיקָ֖ם <S%H7368><s%> that ye might remove them far מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from גְּבוּלָֽם׃ <S%H1366><s%> from their border

הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> I am going מְעִירָ֔ם <S%H5782><s%> Behold I will raise מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַ֨מָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> them out of the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you מְכַרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H4376><s%> whither ye have sold אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> them וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֥י <S%H7725><s%> them and will return גְמֻלְכֶ֖ם <S%H1576><s%> your recompence בְּרֹאשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H7218><s%> upon your own head

וּמָכַרְתִּ֞י <S%H4376><s%> And I will sell אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H1121><s%> your sons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H1323><s%> and your daughters בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּמְכָר֥וּם <S%H4376><s%> and they shall sell לִשְׁבָאיִ֖ם <S%H7615><s%> them to the Sabeans אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about גּ֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> to a people רָח֑וֹק <S%H7350><s%> far off כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken ס

קִרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> Proclaim זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> ye this among the Gentiles קַדְּשׁ֖וּ <S%H6942><s%> Prepare מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> war הָעִ֙ירוּ֙ <S%H5782><s%> wake up הַגִּבּוֹרִ֔ים <S%H1368><s%> the mighty men יִגְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H5066><s%> draw near יַֽעֲל֔וּ <S%H5927><s%> let them come up כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> let all the men הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> of war

כֹּ֤תּוּ <S%H3807><s%> Beat אִתֵּיכֶם֙ <S%H855><s%> your plowshares לַֽחֲרָב֔וֹת <S%H2719><s%> into swords וּמַזְמְרֹֽתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H4211><s%> and your pruninghooks לִרְמָחִ֑ים <S%H7420><s%> into spears הַֽחַלָּ֔שׁ <S%H2523><s%> let the weak יֹאמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> say גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> I [am] strong אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

ע֣וּשׁוּ <S%H5789><s%> Assemble וָבֹ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> yourselves and come כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <S%H1471><s%> all ye heathen מִסָּבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וְנִקְבָּ֑צוּ <S%H6908><s%> and gather yourselves together שָׁ֕מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there הַֽנְחַ֥ת <S%H5181><s%> to come down יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD גִּבּוֹרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1368><s%> thither cause thy mighty ones

יֵע֙וֹרוּ֙ <S%H5782><s%> be wakened וְיַעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> and come up הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> Let the heathen אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> to the valley יְהֽוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <S%H3092><s%> of Jehoshaphat כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֵשֵׁ֛ב <S%H3427><s%> for there will I sit לִשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> to judge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> all the heathen מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

שִׁלְח֣וּ <S%H7971><s%> Put מַגָּ֔ל <S%H4038><s%> ye in the sickle כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for בָשַׁ֖ל <S%H1310><s%> is ripe קָצִ֑יר <S%H7105><s%> for the harvest בֹּ֤אֽוּ <S%H935><s%> come רְדוּ֙ <S%H3381><s%> get you down כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָ֣לְאָה <S%H4390><s%> is full גַּ֔ת <S%H1660><s%> for the press הֵשִׁ֙יקוּ֙ <S%H7783><s%> overflow הַיְקָבִ֔ים <S%H3342><s%> the fats כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for רַבָּ֖ה <S%H7227><s%> [is] great רָעָתָֽם׃ <S%H7451><s%> for their wickedness

הֲמוֹנִ֣ים <S%H1995><s%> Multitudes הֲמוֹנִ֔ים <S%H1995><s%> multitudes בְּעֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> in the valley הֶֽחָר֑וּץ <S%H2742><s%> of decision כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for קָרוֹב֙ <S%H7138><s%> [is] near י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for the day יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּעֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> in the valley הֶחָרֽוּץ׃ <S%H2742><s%> of decision

שֶׁ֥מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> The sun וְיָרֵ֖חַ <S%H3394><s%> and the moon קָדָ֑רוּ <S%H6937><s%> shall be darkened וְכוֹכָבִ֖ים <S%H3556><s%> and the stars אָסְפ֥וּ <S%H622><s%> shall withdraw נָגְהָֽם׃ <S%H5051><s%> their shining

וַיהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מִצִּיּ֣וֹן <S%H6726><s%> out of Zion יִשְׁאָ֗ג <S%H7580><s%> also shall roar וּמִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and utter קוֹל֔וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice וְרָעֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H7493><s%> shall shake שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> and the heavens וָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the earth וַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD מַֽחֲסֶ֣ה <S%H4268><s%> [will be] the hope לְעַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> of his people וּמָע֖וֹז <S%H4581><s%> and the strength לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וִֽידַעְתֶּ֗ם <S%H3045><s%> So shall ye know כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God שֹׁכֵ֖ן <S%H7931><s%> dwelling בְּצִיּ֣וֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Zion הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> mountain קָדְשִׁ֑י <S%H6944><s%> my holy וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> then shall Jerusalem קֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> be holy וְזָרִ֥ים <S%H2114><s%> and there shall no strangers לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יַֽעַבְרוּ־ <S%H5674><s%> pass through בָ֖הּ עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> more ס

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> become בַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִטְּפ֧וּ <S%H5197><s%> shall drop down הֶהָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> [that] the mountains עָסִ֗יס <S%H6071><s%> new wine וְהַגְּבָעוֹת֙ <S%H1389><s%> and the hills תֵּלַ֣כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> will flow חָלָ֔ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲפִיקֵ֥י <S%H650><s%> and all the rivers יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah יֵ֣לְכוּ <S%H1980><s%> will flow מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> with waters וּמַעְיָ֗ן <S%H4599><s%> and a fountain מִבֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יֵצֵ֔א <S%H3318><s%> shall come forth וְהִשְׁקָ֖ה <S%H8248><s%> and shall water אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> the valley הַשִּׁטִּֽים׃ <S%H7851><s%> of Shittim

מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> Egypt לִשְׁמָמָ֣ה <S%H8077><s%> shall be a desolation תִֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> will become וֶאֱד֕וֹם <S%H123><s%> and Edom לְמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> wilderness שְׁמָמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> shall be a desolate תִּֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> will become מֵֽחֲמַס֙ <S%H2555><s%> for the violence בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [against] the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose שָׁפְכ֥וּ <S%H8210><s%> because they have shed דָם־ <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִ֖יא <S%H5355><s%> innocent בְּאַרְצָֽם׃ <S%H776><s%> in their land

וִיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> But Judah לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever תֵּשֵׁ֑ב <S%H3427><s%> shall dwell וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem לְד֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> from generation וָדֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> to generation

וְנִקֵּ֖יתִי <S%H5352><s%> For I will cleanse דָּמָ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> their blood לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not נִקֵּ֑יתִי <S%H5352><s%> [that] I have not cleansed וַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD שֹׁכֵ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> dwelleth בְּצִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> in Zion
